Name: Mövenpick Resort Antalya Tekirova
Description: Mövenpick Antalya Tekirova Resort is a small picturesque town surrounded by the Taurus mountain range, pine forests and orange groves. The abundance of coniferous trees and the proximity of the mountains make it easier to bear the heat, and the crystal clear sea offers truly unlimited opportunities for those who like to engage in water sports, diving or just enjoy swimming.
